website_summaries.verdict: For extra-thick nails, these clippers do the job.
pros: Stainless steel design and extra-sharp, contoured blades
These work as cuticle clippers as well, and a safety cover is included
5 inches in length from blade to handle
cons: The jaws are not as durable as they could be

customer_reviews.title: Will not hold up.
customer_reviews.text: One side of the blade snapped off after cutting a toenail. Don't waste your money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Branigan

customer_reviews.title: Handle snapped after 3rd use
customer_reviews.text: As a product it's a bad joke. It was really the third time I used it that the handle snapped in half. It was on my feisty big toenail but I've always just trimmed that with two dollars clippers from the grocery store that last thousands of uses. Poor materials, poor design, bad cast - who knows? Maybe it's a one-off problem, but's it's still just a waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Buy these if you have ingrown nails!
customer_reviews.text: If you have ingrown toenails, you should buy these right now. Trust me when I say that trying to perform minor surgeries on your big toe with a pair of tweezers, a pocket knife, and a traditional pair of clippers is a bad idea. Buy these before the ingrown nails become even more of a problem. Trust me when I say these are the only way to cut the nail far enough without hurting yourself or paying a lot of money to have a doctor use the same tool. The price may seem quite steep compared to the traditional nail clippers, but these clippers seem to be incredibly well built as well, and I'd expect them to last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality steel.  Bent upon use.
customer_reviews.text: The blade tip on one side bent outwards the first time I used it on my toe nail. Really disappointed in the steel quality. Additionally it was shipped with the tension spring NOT set to the resting/storage position, so when it arrived the tension bar was already partially set resulting in barely any springiness left in it. Not even worth trying to return due to shipping costs.
customer_reviews.author: Predicate

customer_reviews.title: Best I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Best I have ever used. Much superior to traditional clipper, and much higher quality than same type of clipper found at typical drug store. Works on my bad toenails really well. One can be more aggressive removing nails than with most clippers - so one should take care not to cut too far into toe nail area, which can occur easily if not careful. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: GAH

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of clippers like these that got misplaced. I made my decision to buy this clipper solely on the reviews on Amazon. Yes they cut cleanly. Yes they cut all types of nails. Yes they trim cuticles. No, they are not effortless, but yes they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Harry Littell

customer_reviews.title: excellent product BUT MUST READ INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE USING.
customer_reviews.text: It is wonderfully sharp, actually cuts my horribly thick toenails, and comes with a neat storage case and good instructions! My only reservation, which is really due to my own foolishness, is that I did not realize it was the sort of product for which YOU MUST READ THE INSTRUCTIONS FIRST!! It worked so well, that I had two toes bleeding badly--if I had read the instructions first, I would probably not have had this problem!! The clippers seem pretty intuitively obvious, so I did not bother with the instructions until AFTER I cut my toes.
customer_reviews.author: marjorie miller

customer_reviews.title: Ingrown toenail eliminator.
customer_reviews.text: Used this clipper set for my recurring ingrown big toenail. My toe was hurting really bad and swelling, and these were able to go right in and cut out the bad nail without pain. Highly, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: These just snapped in two. I've not used them ...
customer_reviews.text: These just snapped in two. I've not used them much, but one half of the cutter jaw just broke right off. There is another review here with pictures of the same exact sort of failure. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Update on previous review.
customer_reviews.text: This is an update from my previous review on this product. My previous review I stated that it appeared deceptive from the pictures as to what was included in the order. There were pictures of the company's nail lifters along with the clippers which led me to believe that they were included in the purchase. In communication with the company, they stated that the error was on Amazon's side with the coding on the website which showed the products together and they are addressing the issue with Amazon. Received my order and have used the clippers and found them to be very high quality. I have also ordered the lifter set.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Not only did I like the ClipPro Toenail Clipper, I love them. After going to a manicures for several years I started developing a fungus on my toes which turned my nails an ugly dark brown, thick in texture and long. Over the years I've bought several clippers but they never seem to work. They either didn't open wide enough to insert the nail or the nail was too hard preventing the nail from getting clipped. The ClipPro is wide enough for my toesnails plus it clipped the nail with ease. Thank you for making a quality product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Andi O

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Junk...broke at the hinge on the third or fourth use.
customer_reviews.author: N4D

customer_reviews.title: Ordered during Covid Closures
customer_reviews.text: First things first - This item is VERY SHARP, not recommended for children or incompetent adults. I ordered it during Covid after my Podiatrist closed, I have a hard time clipping my toe nails due to other health issues. Always keep in a Safe enclosure, Recommend to keep the Head Cap on after using, you'll never use another toe nail clipper if you're like me and have hard to clip toenails !
customer_reviews.author: Crossing Guard

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product for anyone
customer_reviews.text: this product is, indeed, sharp. it's also dangerous. after reading all instructions, I attempted to clip a thumbnail and injured my thumb. it took weeks to heal. that's a special threat to diabetics whose toes and finger injuries can cause many problems. I would not recommend this product for anyone, especially diabetics. please be careful when using the KP-70 clipper..
customer_reviews.author: sue garrison

customer_reviews.title: Great Clippers
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately have fungus in one toenail which has gotten so thick that regular clippers no longer work. I ordered this pair of clippers and was able to clip that nail easily for the first time in a long time. I highly recommend these clippers. They are sharp so be careful but they do come with a blade protector and a bag to slip the clippers into. The company that I purchased them from shipped them out quickly and I received them on time. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: these slide off my toe nails, especially the gross thick ones? Thought these would be sharper? Another letdown:(?
customer_reviews.author: Sweeper

customer_reviews.title: A Cut Above the Rest!
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I am one of the many Americans with ingrown toenails. I've used a pair of $10 drug store clippers for the last five years with varying degrees of success. Enter the ClipPro!!! It is very sharp, has longer handles for more leverage and it had a thinner blade which made it easier to fit into that tight space. So far, so good....it easily out-performed my old clippers. No, it is not German quality stainless but I expect that this Chinese product will provide many years of close clipping without causing pain or bleeding. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mark L. Appleby

customer_reviews.title: We use this to trim our small dogs nails
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy and very sharp. I have been unable to find satisfactory dog nail trimmers; they all seem to crush the nails rather than cut them or they are made to enclose the nail which leads to yelping. This trimmer allows me to have maximum flexibility and provides me with a much needed tool.
customer_reviews.author: W0rdM1ner

customer_reviews.title: Senior Ladies!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 67 year young female with that pesky problem of thickening toenails.I was thrilled to find these and have to agree with others that they work fantastically! Very sharp easy to grip, seem sturdy enough. My only question is that they came with absolutely no paper work or product inserts whatsoever, and this leads me to wonder if they are returns or knockoffs? Either way, they DO work so I'm giving them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Granny

customer_reviews.title: spring broke
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome although the spring mechanism has broken after only a few weeks of use. For this price they really shouldn't break so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Grippe

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly effective!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I didn't buy something like this earlier. Nail clippers are just nowhere near this good for toenails. I have an ingrown toenail on the right foot and this thing will get through that nail without an issue. You can use it for regular trimming too. FAR more leverage and power than nail clippers. Makes quick work of any toenail, especially because they're harder to get to than your hands. Sharp, well-made, good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Burke

customer_reviews.title: Superior clippers, but can't beat my toe nails
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving these five stars because I believe them to be a good option for those of us with Neanderthal toenails. That said, the 'blade' portion of these clippers actually broke a few days ago when I was clipping my nails. Whether I have the toughest nails known to man (definitely a possibility) or I just received a one-off poorly made pair is up for debate. These were fantastic for the 1 year I used them prior to the most recent incident. If you have concrete style, crusty, old-man toe nail like me you may want to buy a back up pair just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Scottish

customer_reviews.title: Excellent heavy duty for sure... makes clipping real easy.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent heavy duty for sure... makes clipping real easy. Does not cut as round as normal nail clippers - just make more short cuts and easy ! be careful - - easy to cut nails to short. Overall does a great job in the right hands!
customer_reviews.author: theMezz

customer_reviews.title: It does cut very thick toenails
customer_reviews.text: Use with care and as instructed, the blades are very sharp. Patience is required to trim really thick horned toenails as you can only "shave" the nail in short, shallow increments until it is thin enough to cut. This is the first clipper that actually worked on my toenails.
customer_reviews.author: Nallie

customer_reviews.title: Top quality product.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a tendency to grow thick toenails, especially on the big toe, then you will love this clipper. You can spend less to be sure, but this baby looks and feels like what it costs, and I expect to be using it for many, many years. (It's hard to beat stainless steel for durability.) The operation is smooth and precise; the cutting edge could not be any sharper. Do yourself a favor and do not spend less!
customer_reviews.author: WAGinWNY

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: These clippers do exactly what they advertise. They are very sharp and cut through a thick nail. A little large to handle by a small women's hand. However with the leverage provided in the clipper handle, it is fairly certain that you can cut a nail.
customer_reviews.author: PBL

customer_reviews.title: Great for fixing trail runner toenails
customer_reviews.text: My toenails are a mess from running downhills on the trails and curling my toes too much when I run. They get blood blisters under the nail and the whole thing raises up and then I get nails on top of nails and they look terrible. My podiatrist cut them way back with a nail nipper like this and suggested I get one and keep trimming them down until they can start anew. It is working! And these things are really good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Fishstix

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I am very pleased with how well ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I am very pleased with how well they work, much better than I expected. I have had thick, brittle nails with fungus all my life. Always had a tough time cutting them. These clippers were worth even penny. Very sharp, clean cut, easy to control. Love the safety covering too, you need since they like a surgical instrument. Highly recommend them. Most products aren't worth 5 stars for me, but these definitely were. Company was nice to deal with too.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Quality made product!
customer_reviews.text: The product was everything that seller stated product would be. Have only had the clippers for few days BUT I closely examined them at receipt. I particularly appreciate the instructions provided. The clippers appear to be well made. I particularly looked at sharpness and for cutting edge gap(s) when clippers closed. I could see that when first closing the cutting jaws, the forward edge(s) touched first and with just a small additional closing force (of handles) the 2 cutting jaws/surfaces left no gap. Well designed. I have used them on my normal fingernails and clippers work very well. Watchword is to take only small bites (just as included instructions provide).
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Pick another...
customer_reviews.text: Not overly impressed with this nail clipper. Was trying to find a clippers to take care of the corners and while this does technically do that, it is heavy and awkward to hold. Also leaves a sharp/rough edge on the nails.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago-Scott

customer_reviews.title: I want to highly recommend this nail clipper
customer_reviews.text: I want to highly recommend this nail clipper. I had always had ingrown nail and was never able to find something that would really solve the problem, we'll now have tried this one and works wonderfully, not only its easy to handle but it's very sharp. Highly recommend it. For the price your money it's well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Geisha2015

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to Smash and Tear
customer_reviews.text: These are not very sharp nor good at cutting through thick nails. I feel like I am smashing through my nails every time I cut rather than cutting. Avoid these if possible and try a different set.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Carter

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for my type of need
customer_reviews.text: I'm right handed. Used once and made cutting the nails on my left foot, especially the little toes so much easier. The ridges on the handle increased my gripping ability. It is sharp and helped to decrease the time required for nail care. I have nail fungus. Althouh treatment has begun several nails are thick and tough. I would recommend to any one having trouble reaching their nails to cut.
customer_reviews.author: Sandee

customer_reviews.title: BROKE but happy resolution (see photo)
customer_reviews.text: Broke trimming my toenail ... I emailed seller off their Amazon contact, they responded within a couple hours to confirm my address to send current product replacement under their lifetime warranty. They wrote: "I'm really sorry that your KP-700 broke! ... We did encounter a small percentage of our KP-700 failing exactly where your clipper broke. We have since manufactured new lots of clippers using new hardening techniques." Purchased on Amazon 15 months ago, JAN 2017, from WHOLE HEALTH SUPPLY -- seller stands behind their product!
customer_reviews.author: gb

customer_reviews.title: A good toenail clipper.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I've only cut a big toe and the one next to it. I'm waiting to see if the big toe will get ingrown since I'm prone to ingrown toenails and had a very hard time cutting my toenails with a regular nail clipper. Update - contacted the seller re proper procedure for cutting and a quick response with links to hepful videos. This is an excellent toenail clipper. For the first time ever, I can cut my tonenails without fearing anything.
customer_reviews.author: Suncoast

customer_reviews.title: Nice clipper
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a pretty nice toe nail clipper. The blades are sharp and easy to cut down thick nails, and the pointy tips are easy to reach into and remove the in-grown pieces. The spring-back force is appropriate, which makes the opening very smooth. The only con is the blade cannot close tight as one, means there is still a tiny gap between the blades not matter how hard you close them. But, at this price level, you got what you paid. So, don't compare with those $150 clippers.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great for thickening toenails
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my husband, his toenails have thickened as he's aged and he was struggling to get a good clean cut with regular clippers. He's really happy with these clippers. He says they are comfortable in his hand and very sharp! They are good quality. We received them in a timely fashion. I'm thinking about ordering another pair for his travel kit.
customer_reviews.author: L. Leon

customer_reviews.title: Best Clippers I Have Used
customer_reviews.text: I have never been satisfied with clippers before. They didn't cut very well and you must use excessive pressure to cut thick toe nails, even after soaking. These are exceptionally sharp and cut with much less effort. They easily cut deep as well as very slight cuts. Just have to be careful since they are exceptionally sharp. I highly recommend these clippers.
customer_reviews.author: Forme

customer_reviews.title: Very good clippers!
customer_reviews.text: Saved myself a trip to the podiatrist when I hurt my big toenail. With these clippers, I could cut back the nail past the injury and disinfect it well. It's what the doctor did for an injury last year and it cost me $100 because it was classified as a surgical procedure. I'm so glad I found these. Faster relief and cheaper than a doctor visit. Great for ingrown toenails, too.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Amos

customer_reviews.title: This product works
customer_reviews.text: I've been grinding my toe nails for many years. This product has allowed me to trim my nails without grinding, soaking or anything else. They were easy to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Rich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good solid pro nail clipper. Well worth purchasing. Arrived on-time and was well packaged. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Randahl

customer_reviews.title: Clips well, stores with caution.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised thick nail toenail clipper. That the tip protector won't stay in place begat a nasty stab when reaching into my dopp kit. Now I store it with the spring folded back, wrapped in a scrap of terry cloth inside a snack-sized plastic zipper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Kerkling

customer_reviews.title: One Of The Best Personal Hygiene Purchases I've Ever Made
customer_reviews.text: I have a toenail on a big toe that was shattered while playing football. It never grew back correctly and now forty some years later I still have a hard time trimming it because it curls into my actual toe. This product makes quick work of it and for the first time in all these years I finally feel like I'm on top of it. It's surgically sharp and constructed like a medical instrument as well. Can't speak highly enough of it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and machine work
customer_reviews.text: I had an ingrown nail on my big toe that my regular clippers just couldn't get to so I ordered the Kohm KP-700. After it arrived I was able to get to business and clip out the jagged part of the nail which was starting to become painful. I was thoroughly impressed with the quality and machine work of the clipper, so much so, I just ordered the the WHS-500 combo toenail and fingernail clippers and the KP-7100 lifter set. I'm giving 5 stars for this item and I very rarely give out 5 stars. If you have thick unwieldy toenails then I recommend one or more of the Kohm products,
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Too hard
customer_reviews.text: I have to squeeze as hard as I can and sometimes get help to cut any of my nails. I can't even use them on my fingers. The cutter is curved too much and it is hard trim properly.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I live these clippers
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying for years to find a toenail clipper that would be able to cut my big fat large toenail without success. The klippro toenail clipper finally does the job. Works great. I live these clippers. Some of the other clippers would fit my nails but were so dull they didn't even come close to cutting the nail. Thanks klipPro.
customer_reviews.author: David M Rich

customer_reviews.title: good for about 4 uses,  then not
customer_reviews.text: Cut fine at first; now it's not as good as my old ones, that are many, many years old and that I was trying to replace. Of course, I'm now a week past the return window, so am stuck with them. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper1

customer_reviews.title: Great. Just flippin great.
customer_reviews.text: Started getting really bad hang nails a while back. Tearing and biting resulted in some raw bloody fingers for a year straight. Did some desperate reading and then bought these. My only regret is that it isn't practical to always have them with me when a hangnail starts to form. Seriously these are awesome. They feel like something you'd see on a surgery table. Very well made. When these wear out I'll be buying another. So worth it.
customer_reviews.author: nimbice

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly, works easily, works painlessly.
customer_reviews.text: While watching a nurse practitioner use a similar tool to easily clip my elderly mother's very thick toenails, I said, "I gotta get one of those". After struggling with my big right-toe for years, I was able to snip it SO straight, SO easily, and SO cleanly (no crumbling) with this tool. I am amazed and thrilled at how easy it is. Just follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: debrainbrs

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: The product seems well made and of good quality. It just did not work for me. I did not like the way it fit my hand and the curved clipper made it very hard for me to use. I ended up returning it. This is just my opinion of it. It may work just fine for you.
customer_reviews.author: Rootie

customer_reviews.title: Your Toenails Will Thank You
customer_reviews.text: These toenail clippers are a big step above the functionality of my previous device - which was simply an overgrown version of fingernail clippers. It's still a bit awkward to clip your own toenails; better to have someone else do it (assuming a sufficient level of trust!). But if you're doing it yourself, the Kohm product is a great improvement. The clippers come with a set of instructions and a very nice plastic storage packet. My podiatrist recommended that I purchase a "surgical" clipper such as this item, and she was right on the money!
customer_reviews.author: Peter D. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Best Nail Clippers!!!
customer_reviews.text: These clippers are outstanding. I tried to trim my elderly mother's problem toe nails with traditional clippers a while back, and it was just about impossible. I actually ended up using side cutters out of my tool box. I used the KlipPro clippers on her nails today, and it was amazing how well these clippers work. They are razor sharp, easy to control, and the perfect solution for large, irregular nails. It made the job a breeze! If you are considering these clippers, do not hesitate to place your order. I am even considering buying another pair as a backup set.
customer_reviews.author: Bigfoot Believer

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective/ Doesn’t Do Job
customer_reviews.text: Continually slides upward and off nail you are trying to cut. Expensive for something useless
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln Duncan

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a strong and tough pair of toe nail clippers for quite some time. I had only found a pair that were $50.00, a bit more than I wanted to spend. I found these on amazon, They are serious clippers. You have to be very careful using them they are SHARP. I was use to a ancient pair of traditional clippers. I would follow their advice and soak your feet a little while to soften the nails a bit, makes the job much easier and gives more control. I've had nail fungus for a long time, thanks to my military time in Thailand during the Viet Nam war. Anyway bottom line, a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I think this clippers might solve the problem since it reaches to the corner of the nail easily, and cutting doesn't require the strength needed to ...
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance when I ordered this because I wasn't sure it would really work. I was pleasantly surprised when it arrived and does exactly what it claims. It is so much easier to cut thick nails. I've had issues with ingrown nails, but I think this clippers might solve the problem since it reaches to the corner of the nail easily, and cutting doesn't require the strength needed to use other clippers.
customer_reviews.author: blackdog

customer_reviews.title: Better than others of it's kind
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few of these. I have chronic ingrown toe nails and being older, my nails tend to be hard to cut. This so far is the best one I found. Real quality. It is sharper than most and the nibs can really get to the hard to reach areas.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia P. Surrey

customer_reviews.title: These things are awesome, especially when your toenails are like decorative patio ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome, especially when your toenails are like decorative patio stones. ( I blame the flip flops for the heavy duty toenails ) I'm pretty sure these could trim Wolverines "other" nails
customer_reviews.author: ViolentMouse

customer_reviews.title: DO. NOT. BUY
customer_reviews.text: Large clunky and the curve causes you to cut off nail you didn’t mean to nip
customer_reviews.author: Linda Krajcar

customer_reviews.title: Will not cut!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these nail cutters because of the great reviews. They arrived today and I tried to cut my toenails but would not cut. I clamped down on the handles with all my strength just wouldn't cut. Maybe I just got a bad pair.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Best Clippers
customer_reviews.text: “GREAT!! cuts thick toenails with ease. Works great on finger nails also. Easy to see where you are cutting on the nail. Much better than the other style clippers.” Handles well for right or left hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nail clipper works great on extra thick toenails
customer_reviews.text: I had some serious toenail fungus on my big toes and needed to clip off as much of them as possible to apply the anti fungal medication. This clipper did the trick and I am now free of toenail fungus.An ordinary toenail clipper could not do the job but this clipper did it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Fitness guru

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product, worth the price. For too long I had used various scissors for toe nail trimming. I run daily, taking care of my feet and nails are important. This is why I opted for these clippers. They are professional quality, well made, and packaged with a storage case designed to keep these trimmers for the long term. Other than misplacing them I can foresee no reason to purchase another clippers.
customer_reviews.author: Black Pony

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that has worked on my super thick big toe nail
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that has worked on my super thick big toe nail. It was such a relief I thought it was going to become ingrown. I soaked my feet and this thing did miracles.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Great toenail clipper
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a great nail clipper for your toenails then this is the one to get. It is precision made and really works well with its curved cutting edges. I have tried a number of nail clippers but this one is the best I have found so far. Kudos to the maker of a real good precision nail cutter.Very well made as the craftsmanship stands out on this cutter.
customer_reviews.author: ron youngblood

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several products to try to deal with my toenails, and this is the best one. These clippers look designed to last forever. They are sturdy and handily take care of my thick nails. For me, they took some getting used to because I hadn't used this kind of clipper before, but now I can't imagine using any other kind of product.
customer_reviews.author: Pat T.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty well made...
customer_reviews.text: Wife wanted clippers for her birthday, so being the big spender I am bought these for her present. Happy wife, happy life. Nice clippers and will last longer than flowers!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia-Jim

customer_reviews.title: very useful - they open wide enough to get very thick ...
customer_reviews.text: Very, very useful - they open wide enough to get very thick nails, and the blades are sharp enough to snip through very tough old keratin. I was pleased and surprised to find not only the clippers in the box, but also a sturdy transparent carry for them so you could take this through security.
customer_reviews.author: Garland Wayne Ligon Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made product that does exactly what it’s supposed to do. The blades are sharp and I like that the package has an instruction sheet on how to use the clippers safely. Especially important if you have very thick or misshapen toenails.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Burke

customer_reviews.title: Best Toenail Clippers!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase. These clippers by Kohm are very well made. Easy to squeeze hand grip. Makes cutting thick toenails much easier...you will avoid getting ingrown toenails with these clippers.
customer_reviews.author: JudiPen

customer_reviews.title: Not good for thick nails
customer_reviews.text: These clippers are not good for thick nails as they smash them instead of cutting. But they are great for thin regular nails. I believe advertisement is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: nemceva133

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a good craftsmanship. Well machined and fitted. There's a little roller on the spring wire. I haven't used this type of clipper before, but this one did the trick for cutting a nail edge for an ingrown toenail.
customer_reviews.author: Michael8596

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: If you have ingrown toenails, buy this, use it and you'll be happy. I had a sore ingrown toenail and this gave me almost instant relief. Use them as per instructions for best results.
customer_reviews.author: Love to Learn

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for those who need to clip really thick nails
customer_reviews.text: Sadly the toenail on my left big toe has become thick and curly. Nothing was working to trim it, so in desperation I bought these, even though I found them a bit scary. But they clipped it right into the correct length and shape so now I'm a believer. Highly recommended for those who need to clip really thick nails.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Walters

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I wish I had bought it sooner
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I wish I had bought it sooner. I was using one made by J. A. Henckels, which was good when new, but I don't remember being as good as this even when new.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hartounian

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This sharp little tool was exactly what I needed. It’s easy to hold and really gets in crevice of the nail to cut. I don’t have to clamp down hard for it to cut. I’ve had it for about a year now and it’s held up. It’s still as sharp as it was when I first used it. I recommend this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best out there!
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly! I love this toenail clipper...It is exactly what I was looking for and is easy to use. Thank-you for supplying a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta E. Larrow

customer_reviews.title: Works so Much Better Than Standard Clippers
customer_reviews.text: These clippers are really sharp and I was a bit hesitant to give them a try. Actually being so sharp makes them easier to use. I also like the plastic cover that protects the blades when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Doobie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy package, very sturdy tool. Very impressed!!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy package, very sturdy tool. Im a cosmtologist and i do a lot of pedicures on older people. I've paid as much as $30 on a pair of nippers That were supposed to be top quality extremely sharp and turn around and broke the 1st time I tried to use them on thick nails. Needless to say I got my money back but I could tell a difference from the moment I had these in hand that they were a better quality and the price was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: takes some practice
customer_reviews.text: Go slow at first with these clippers so you don't injure yourself as the tips are sharp and the blades are at unusual angles. But they work great and made clipping my toenails so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: mike s

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable product
customer_reviews.text: First time I have received an item that I am returning. They honestly will not cut paper. I have ordered a different pair with the hopes they will serve my need.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Steinert

customer_reviews.title: NOT STAINLESS FALSE ADVERTISING!
customer_reviews.text: This item began to rust after a few months. It is advertised as stainless but clearly it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Izzman

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable, but not great
customer_reviews.text: The handles are long enough to provide decent grip and leverage for applying force. But the curved blade is not helpful, and the rationale for having it doesn't hold up in usage. Better to have a straight blade with a long, pointed nose to get under difficult nails.
customer_reviews.author: Gator

customer_reviews.title: but think they will work great! They are heavy and seem shark
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my 86 year old uncle's toenails. I haven't had a chance to use them yet, but think they will work great! They are heavy and seem shark. Since his toenails are so thick, I think these, along with the large clippers I bought will do the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Evans

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sharp but a little awkward for me to handle
customer_reviews.text: I help my elderly mother clip her toenails as she can't anymore. I bought these thinking they would make the task a bit easier because moms nails are so tough. The clippers are very sharp and cut well but I find them a little awkward to work with. I will keep them and continue to use them but only on the most difficult nails. Outside of my awkwardness in using them I think they're pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy-Q

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Clippers.
customer_reviews.text: Waited to see how they work....Great! Super sharp, Will cut very heavy nails and because their sharp, don't hurt if cutting close. Work especially well on in-grown toenails. Can dig the corners out, removing all little pieces that if left cause pain and discomfort. This was one of my better purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Herb J

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Wish it were a bit smaller for my hands, since they’re quite smaller than normal. Very sharp, be careful on the edges and tip of the toes. Great purchase overall
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: I opened and used the trimmer right away. It was sharp and cut effortlessly. Delivery was next day! What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Rothschild

customer_reviews.title: First rate tool, first rate craftsman ship -- and sharp
customer_reviews.text: Not being an expert on pedicure, I wasn't aware of this type of device. I won't discuss my toenails but I will say that ordinary clipper couldn't cope with them. These clippers are incredibly effective, incredibly well made. And SHARP. If you're like me and were not familiar with how to use this type of clipper, be careful until you are practiced enough not to cut off more than you intended.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and Precise
customer_reviews.text: The Nail Nipper KP-700 is a professional grade nipper perfect for difficult nails. My husband's toenails are very hard and these nippers allowed me to clip close on the sides and across the top, where they tend to curl in, without catching any skin. The Nail Nipper KP-700 is well balanced, fits nicely in the hand, and is very sharp. I recommend it without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalene

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Efficient
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, fair price for a high quality product. Impressive packaging with directions (great idea since it is sharper then sharp) and have a safety cap. I expect to save money on time consuming and not always pleasant nail salon visits with this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Gail L. Lanning

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic, I had been using a regular pair of ...
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic, I had been using a regular pair of wire snips to try and deal with my thick toenails with some success. Then i got these and what a difference the correct tool makes, my nails are getting better and these clippers work great on regular nails too.
customer_reviews.author: Pete McElmo Canyon

customer_reviews.title: Great Clipper
customer_reviews.text: Clipper is great. As I've gotten older my toenails have gotten thicker and more difficult for me to cut. Bigger clippers just weren't the answer until I found the Kohm toenail clipper. Blades are sharp and just enough leverage to handle my tough toenails.
customer_reviews.author: tampajym

customer_reviews.title: Cuts With Way More Precison Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a simple nail clipper to keep my toe nails trim. This is WAY more than your average clipper. It cuts nest, straight and easy. I was not expecting such professional results.. I can see this being used in a nail salon. It is a high quality clipper and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: C.T

customer_reviews.title: KlipPro Toenail Clippers
customer_reviews.text: While going to the nail salon I picked up a fungus, which settled in my big toe. I went through the two rounds of prescription meds. Side effects of this problem include thick, ingrown nails. I purchased the KlipPro to alleviate the problem. And, the clippers are fantastic! They are very sharp, so be very careful! The clippers are easy to hold, easy to manuever. A bit pricey, but so well-made, plan on keeping them for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Cutting that big toe nail is a bear! I was using the large 'finger nail' clippers until I got tired of that. Then I tried a pair of side cutters from my electrical toolbox, and they were an improvement but were kinda painful to use - probably too broad an angle on the blades. These clippers seem to do the job quite well. Blades are sharp and well shaped, and the handles give a good grip and squeeze. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: aesch

customer_reviews.title: Works OK
customer_reviews.text: OK quality ,but do not cut tough nails as easily as represented
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great Toenail Clippers!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very pleased with them. He has wanted a pair just like them ever since he saw the podiatrist's toenail clippers and now he has one. Great clippers!
customer_reviews.author: Luanne Serrato

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sharp
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sharp, but the blade is a lot longer than expected. They're too long to use on any toes other than my big ones, but they work very well nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff! great!
customer_reviews.text: Great they get my giant toenails that are 3 in thick LOL
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Quick work to clip a mutant toenail
customer_reviews.text: I have a mutant big toenail due to a fungus that developed on it. After doing an internet search on clipping a thick nail, this product was recommended. I just used it for the first time and it made quick work of clipping. Very easy to use and very sharp, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: AR

product_meta.title: Kohm KP-700 Toenail Clippers for Thick/Ingrown Nails, Surgical Grade Stainless Steel, 5" Long. Includes Safety Tip Cover and Instruction Guide
feature_bullets: PACKAGING COLOR MAY VARY – you will receive your Kohm KP-700 Professional Style Nail Nipper in our original grey or our NEW bright orange.
IDEAL FOR THICK NAILS – The Kohm KP-700 Toenail Clipper/Nipper is the perfect nail tool for your extra thick and irregular nails due to fungus, age, or other condition causing irregular growth.

WIDE JAWS on these heavy-duty professional nail clippers open up to over 1” (3 cm) wide. Blades are slightly curved to contour around nails. The sharp pointed tips are ideal to carefully handle ingrown nails.

EASY GRIP AND SMOOTH CONTROL – 5.1” (13 cm) in total length make it easier to grip and requires less effort to control than regular top down clipper models. Ridged handles are designed to increase traction. Your Kohm KP-700 Toenail Clipper can be used by a right or left-handed adult. Those with less than ideal mobility or steadiness in their hands should seek professional assistance when trimming their thick or tough nails with this extremely sharp, wide jaw nail clipper.

STAINLESS STEEL is easy to clean and sanitize. Toenail clipper be used in an autoclave or simply wipe with alcohol after use to disinfect. Securely store with included safety tip and please read the included instruction manual before use.
